text: Jerónimo Carvalho de Sousa (; born 13 April 1947) is a Portuguese politician. He has been General Secretary of the Portuguese Communist Party since November 2004. He is a member of the Assembly of the Republic. He was also a candidate for President of Portugal in the 2006 election. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Communist politicians Category:Portuguese politicians
title: Jerónimo de Sousa
